TWO YOUNG TOUGHS take a card and tear it in half, chuckling, shining the DEAFMUTE on.  A HOOKER, the heart-of-gold type, stuffs a buck in his tin cup.  He reaches TIPTREE and extends a card; TIPTREE ignores him, refusing to make eye contact --
TIPTREE's eyes widen.  The DEAFMUTE -- who is in fact FRICK --
STOP THERE.
-- and brings up his .38 AUTOMATIC, firing THREE QUICK SHOTS at the PENGUIN.  The shots RICOCHET LOUDLY off the umbrella --

-- arriving finally on the ragged black figure of BATMAN as he staggers forth from the shadows, dazed and bloody.  He scans the tunnel, finding no trace of his enemies -- and then his gaze falls on DICK.
